title: Is there any fee reimbursement for AP students with below 10000 TS EAMCET rank in Telangana state? - Quora
tags: Engineering Agricultural and Medical Common Entrance Test (EAMCET)

response.answer_text: Hello, I think there will be no fee reimbursement is given to ANDHRAPRADESH CANDIDATES, fee reimbursement scheme is only applicable for TELANGANA residentials only . All the best Thank you

You can get fee reimbursement if you have SC/ST caste certificate or if you have income certificate irrespective of your rank. If you have BC caste certificate you can get full reimbursement if you get a rank below 10k and partial reimbursement if rank is above 10k. This is applicable to both AP and Telangana.
